title: Dragnor
introMessage:
Clickable Buttons







Welcome to The Home of Dragon-type Pokemon!
Anyone is welcome here as long as they follow the rules and are friendly to all our users. Feel free to summon the Shiny Rayquaza that lives here anytime you want! Why not come in and stick around for a while? Have fun ^_^ You might make some new friends!

News & Announcements:None at the moment. Please enjoy your stay ^_^
desc: Come hang in the home of Dragon-type Pokemon!
